abstract: The F.C.C.’s rejection of LightSquared’s broadband plan could spell disaster for the hedge fund manager Philip A. Falcone, who has spent billions of dollars on the project.
snippet: The F.C.C.’s rejection of LightSquared’s broadband plan could spell disaster for the hedge fund manager Philip A. Falcone, who has spent billions of dollars on the project.
lead_paragraph: It was as ambitious a bet as any hedge fund manager could imagine: building a wireless network from scratch to compete with the likes of AT&T and Verizon.

headline.main: Loss of a Wireless Dream Caps a Fast Fall From Grace
